question:
Which among the following statements is/are correct about Agriculture?
  1. It is the biggest unorganized sector of the economy accounting for more than 90 per cent share in the total unorganized labor-force.
  2. Productivity of major crops are lower in case of India in comparison to the world’s best practice.
Select the correct code from the options given below:
explanation: Agriculture is the most important sector of the Indian economy. It is the biggest unorganized sector of the economy. It accounts for more than 90 per cent share in the total unorganized labor-force. Productivity of major crops are lower in case of India in comparison to the world’s best practice.
